titleStmt.title: Looke to it: for, Ile stabbe ye
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: By E. Allde for W. Ferbrand, and George Loftes, and are to be solde in Popes-head Allie,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: S.R., i.e. Samuel Rowlands.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
